about_the_game:
Dive into an enhanced strategic experience with the new Warping Core Challenge Pack! This DLC grants players access to the warping core challenge game mode on three new maps; Arcane Library, Omenak, and Infested Ruins.

Conquer each map with the Warping Core modifier to unlock exclusive gear;

  • Zamira Bracers: Obtained by completing Warping Cores: Arcane Library.
  • Zamira Mask: Obtained by conquering Warping Cores: Omenak.
  • Zamira Hat: Obtained by finishing Warping Cores: Infested Ruins.

Complete all three maps and return to your tavern to receive a unique pet; Zamira's Mount, a loyal companion to aid you in your defense.

Prepare yourself for chaos and newfound challenge in this new warping core challenge pack!

Complete all three maps and return to your tavern to receive a unique pet; Zamira's Mount, a loyal companion to aid you in your defense.

Prepare yourself for chaos and newfound challenge in this new warping core challenge pack!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1 Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 2GB
  • Video Card: Graphics Card with Shader Model 3 support, 256 MB video memory
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Sound: DirectSound-compatible sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 2GB
  • Video Card: Graphics Card with Shader Model 3 support, 512 MB video memory
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Sound: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional:
